com.bigdata.bop

Interface BufferAnnotations

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AbstractAccessPathOp.Annotations, AbstractAddRemoveStatementsOp.Annotations, AbstractSubqueryOp.Annotations, AccessPathJoinAnnotations, ArbitraryLengthPathOp.Annotations, ChunkedMaterializationOp.Annotations, ChunkedResolutionOp.Annotations, CommitOp.Annotations, ConditionalRoutingOp.Annotations, CopyOp.Annotations, DataSetJoin.Annotations, DistinctTermScanOp.Annotations, DropOp.Annotations, FastRangeCountOp.Annotations, FederatedQueryEngine.Annotations, GroupByOp.Annotations, HashIndexOp.Annotations, HashIndexOpBase.Annotations, HashJoinOp.Annotations, HTreeDistinctBindingSetsOp.Annotations, HTreeHashJoinAnnotations, HTreeHashJoinOp.Annotations, HTreeMergeJoin.Annotations, HTreeNamedSubqueryOp.Annotations, InlineMaterializeOp.Annotations, InsertOp.Annotations, IPredicate.Annotations, IsInlineBOp.Annotations, JoinAnnotations, JoinGraph.Annotations, JVMDistinctBindingSetsOp.Annotations, JVMHashJoinAnnotations, JVMHashJoinOp.Annotations, JVMMergeJoin.Annotations, JVMNamedSubqueryOp.Annotations, MemoryGroupByOp.Annotations, MockTermResolverOp.Annotations, NestedLoopJoinOp.Annotations, ParseOp.Annotations, PipelinedAggregationOp.Annotations, PipelineDelayOp.Annotations, PipelinedHashIndexAndSolutionSetJoinOp.Annotations, PipelineJoin.Annotations, PipelineOp.Annotations, Predicate.Annotations, ProjectionOp.Annotations, QueryEngine.Annotations, ServiceCallJoin.Annotations, SliceOp.Annotations, SolutionSetHashJoinOp.Annotations, SortOp.Annotations, SPOPredicate.Annotations, SPOStarJoin.Annotations, SubqueryJoinAnnotations, SubqueryOp.Annotations, VariableUnificationOp.Annotations, ZeroLengthPathOp.Annotations

    public interface BufferAnnotations
    Annotations for BlockingBuffer as used by various kinds of operators.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CHUNK_CAPACITY
      Sets the capacity of the IBindingSet[]s used to accumulate a chunk of IBindingSets (default 100).
      static String CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY
      The maximum #of chunks that can be buffered before an the producer would block (default 5).
      static String CHUNK_TIMEOUT
      The timeout in milliseconds that the BlockingBuffer will wait for another chunk to combine with the current chunk before returning the current chunk (default 10).
      static TimeUnit chunkTimeoutUnit
      The TimeUnits in which the CHUNK_TIMEOUT is measured.
      static int DEFAULT_CHUNK_CAPACITY
      Default for CHUNK_CAPACITY
      static int DEFAULT_CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY
      Default for CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY
      static int DEFAULT_CHUNK_TIMEOUT
      The default for CHUNK_TIMEOUT.

    • Field Detail

      • CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY

        static final String CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY
        The maximum #of chunks that can be buffered before an the producer would block (default 5). Note that partial chunks may be combined into full chunks whose nominal capacity is specified by CHUNK_CAPACITY.

      • DEFAULT_CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY

        static final int DEFAULT_CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY
        Default for CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CHUNK_CAPACITY

        static final String CHUNK_CAPACITY
        Sets the capacity of the IBindingSet[]s used to accumulate a chunk of IBindingSets (default 100). Partial chunks may be automatically combined into full chunks.
        See Also:
        CHUNK_OF_CHUNKS_CAPACITY

      • DEFAULT_CHUNK_CAPACITY

        static final int DEFAULT_CHUNK_CAPACITY
        Default for CHUNK_CAPACITY
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CHUNK_TIMEOUT

        static final String CHUNK_TIMEOUT
        The timeout in milliseconds that the BlockingBuffer will wait for another chunk to combine with the current chunk before returning the current chunk (default 10). This may be ZERO (0) to disable the chunk combiner.

      • DEFAULT_CHUNK_TIMEOUT

        static final int DEFAULT_CHUNK_TIMEOUT
        The default for CHUNK_TIMEOUT.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • chunkTimeoutUnit

        static final TimeUnit chunkTimeoutUnit
        The TimeUnits in which the CHUNK_TIMEOUT is measured.
